stories.text:
Credentials in CI/CD pipeline may posses a bigger threat. Know How and Why with this short flyer sponsored by GitGuardian.

This flyer simplifies Compromises in CI/CD pipelines. Download HD version of the flyer from here : https://lnkd.in/dKsx8ZG4

#infosec #cybersecurity #appsec #security #bugbounties. Dont miss any of such flyer, and get it in your inbox every Monday, for that subscribe to our newsletter : https://lnkd.in/dWEEsi6F I am hopeful you liked this one. If you like it, do consider sharing a word about it.
